Tartu linn,

EST

description.en: This course introduces the basics of statistical background employed by econometricians. The following topics are covered: random variables, distribution, hypothesis testing, sample and population moments, properties of OLS (Ordinary Least Squares), endogeneity.
description.et: Kursus tutvustab ökonomeetriliseks analüüsiks vajalikke statistika baasteadmisi. Kursuse raames kaetakse järgmisi teemasid: juhuslikud muutujad, statistilised jaotused, hüpoteeside testimine, valimi ja üldkogumi momendid, lihtsa vähimruutude meetodi omadused, endogeensus.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to give an introductory statistical base of econometrics and to introduce the main concepts of regression analysis.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on anda ökonomeetria õppimiseks vajalik statistiline baas ja tutvustada üliõpilastele regressioonianalüüsi üldist ideed ja põhimõisteid.

description.et: In order to pass the course it is required to submit a final individual project. In order to pass the course one needs to get at least 50 out of 100 points for the final report. Details will be provided during the first week of the course.

grade_evaluation.et: The evaluation will be done based on the written final report.

debt_elimination.et: In general order. Exceptions are possible by agreement with the instructor.
